mapper.select: select num,email,nick, subject, c_content, c_date,readcount from ${kategorie} where c_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and subject like '%' || #{keyword}|| '%' or c_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by c_date desc

select c.num,c.email,c.nick, c.subject, c.c_content, c.c_date,c.readcount,w.* from ${kategorie} c, ${kind} w on c.num =w.w_doc_no where (w.w_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} )and c.subject like '%' || #{keyword}|| '%' or c.c_content like '%' || #{keyword}|| '%' order by w.w_status asc,w.w_date desc
